name: Space Shooter Co-Op
description:
The Classic Space Shooter Game but Co-Op.

WASD to move Space ship-1 and [Space] to Shoot.

Arrow Keys to move Space ship-2.

Credits:

Background: https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/space

Spaceships: https://kenney.itch.io/ship-mixer

Sound & Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
